p: In addition, the SHG coefficients ( d ij) of Rb 3Na(H 2C 3N 3O 3) 4·3H 2O were computed to further understand the NLO properties. The space group Pmn2 1 belongs to the class mm2 point group and possesses 2 nonzero independent SHG coefficients ( d 15 = −0.0675 pm/V, d 33 = 0.136 pm/V) under the restriction of Kleinman symmetry. The theoretically estimated value is in good agreement with the experimental one in Figure S6 in the SI.
